This game just shows how much the community on ValvE games has stagnated.
It shows no friendliness to you making mistakes in let's say comp,cause you know,you'll get deranked.
The main thing about games is having fun,and you will have fun for maybe first 5 hours of gameplay in this thing.
I want to get my 2,5k hours of life back,cause this game is just so bad.
